title: Sex & Culture: Warren Farrell & Mary Harrington
description:
In the post #metoo era, what is the current state of the conversation around sex and gender in the culture?

For the first film of a new series, we hear from  the 'father of the men's movement',couples therapist Warren Farrell, and writer Mary Harrington, who describes herself as a 'reactionary feminist'. 

To join the audience and ask questions for future films in this series, check out the Rebel Wisdom Digital Campfire: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/campfire-events

Rebel Wisdom will also be appearing in September at the Inner State Festival: https://innerstatefestival.com/
